name: Haze (itch) (Apex Games)
description:
Haze is a casual, indie adventure 3D platformer.

Built in a few weeks as a quick Unity project , Haze turned into a fun and relaxing platformer with casual story elements.

"Enjoyable to play though still provides challenging aspects"

Terrain and Mechanics

A variety of terrain and mechanics makes this game fun to play as you switch between the two characters Max and Amy as they go on their Journey. Falling islands, moving Islands and grappling make the game enjoyable at all stages. The game takes between 40-90 minutes depending on skill level.

" Abilities like grappling are easy to learn but hard to master and are widely applicable through all levels to find shortcuts or alternative routes"

Graphics and Map

The game features a low poly art style ,Unity's lighting systems and a fantasy daylight cycle making it pleasant to look at and play with.

"When graphics are set high the game comes to life, making use of the low poly art-style"
